adrFormatAddress: 114 E 71st St Suite1E, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: I have been seeing Natalia at Georgia Louise for several years now. I am convinced that she is the best facialist in NYC, hands down. She has worked diligently to understand my skin (I have sensitive skin and melasma), and she customizes my treatments to ensure I walk out glowing. I've seen her before my wedding, big events, and just for regular upkeep. Beyond being a talented facialist, she's also just a lovely person. The Georgia Louise space is also so calm and relaxing, and it's always a treat to go!

originalText.text: Georgia has the most magical hands. Anytime I leave there my skin is GLOWING. She customizes every treatment every time we are together. It’s thoughtful and luxurious. So thankful to have her taking care of my skin.

text.text: Georgia has the most magical hands. Anytime I leave there my skin is GLOWING. She customizes every treatment every time we are together. It’s thoughtful and luxurious. So thankful to have her taking care of my skin.

originalText.text: I recently had a facial with Natalia at Georgia Louise Atelier, and it was an amazing experience. From the moment I walked in, Natalia made me feel comfortable and relaxed. She took the time to understand my skin concerns and tailored the treatment to my specific needs. Throughout the facial, she explained each step and provided helpful tips on how to care for my skin at home. The results were fantastic - my skin looked and felt rejuvenated, and the benefits lasted for days. Natalia's expertise and attention to detail are truly impressive, and I can't recommend her enough.

text.text: I recently had a facial with Natalia at Georgia Louise Atelier, and it was an amazing experience. From the moment I walked in, Natalia made me feel comfortable and relaxed. The results were fantastic - my skin looked and felt rejuvenated, and the benefits lasted for days. Natalia's expertise and attention to detail are truly impressive, and I can't recommend her enough.

originalText.text: This review is reflective of Georgia’s online shop. I am leaving my review here because her website doesn’t let you review her products. I bought the face mask when it was originally $1500 it has since gone down drastically to around $900. It only includes a one year warranty. It stopped working randomly without any damage occurring. Plug it in and it just doesn’t work. Reached out multiple times to only be offered a 10% discount to buy another. Upset is an understatement buyers beware!

originalText.text: Absolutely love Natalia! She does such great work on my skin and I always look so glowy and refreshed after seeing her. She is one of the best estheticians in NYC!
